snippet: PRESSER--Rhoda. The Board of American Friends of Shalva mourn the passing of Rhoda Presser, mother of board member Mitchell Presser. We extend our deepest sympathies to Mitchell and the entire family. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Norm Alpert and Carol Levin, Co-Presidents; Kalman Samuels, Shalva Founder and Chairman; Leo Klein, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: PRESSER--Rhoda. The Board of American Friends of Shalva mourn the passing of Rhoda Presser, mother of board member Mitchell Presser. We extend our deepest sympathies to Mitchell and the entire family. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Norm Alpert and Carol Levin, Co-Presidents; Kalman Samuels, Shalva Founder and Chairman; Leo Klein, Executive Director 1/3
